title: Ticket #351: Build and run unit tests on Windows
description: The unit tests in src/condor_unit_tests currently don't build or run on Windows. They should.
remarks:
2009-Jun-24 11:50:08 by ziliang:
The condor_unit_tests compiles and links. The test_daemon_core is having a linking issue that I am not sure how to resolve and am leaving to Ben to see what the cause might be.

2010-Aug-17 14:12:42 by ziliang:
Wait on cmake branch.
check_ins: 2010-Nov-09 14:56   Check-in [19351]: Port unit tests over to Windows and import an implementation of gettimeofday for the time being. Ticket #351. (By Ziliang Guo )
